name: Dingletopia: Nation Under Siege (by Orcs)
description:
It's a nice sunny day in Dingletopia and Prince Dingle Dorfen and his wise adviser Forlorn Gumpel are slurping up the gorpulsen and planning their next conquest. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when Orcs burst into the lands with rattling sabers.

How will YOU rule Dingletopia?

GENRE
Epic High Fantasy War Strategy-palooza Bonanza

GAME INFO
Use your wits and influence to expand your empire. Build your armies to attack and defend against the Orcs. Make impossible choices that will echo throughout history.

PROS
 22 unique units.
 Non-linear nation building and strategy.
 Teaches about Dwarf lore.

CONS
 Is in a Fantasy setting.
 Is less enjoyable than winning the lottery.
 Contains Orc imagery.
